resources.string: This app attempts to show how easily passwords autofilled using LastPass can be sniffed by malicious applications
Simply open up Chrome and fill in a password as you would usually. When we sniff it, we\'ll post a notification
We do NOT store the passwords or send them anywhere; this app does not even have the Internet permission. The only place they are used is in the notification when they are sniffed
The clipboard vulnerability is well known in the security community. The paper that inspired this proof of concept can be found at http://fc13.ifca.ai/proc/4–2.pdf
